SWSafetyMeasures
[Package]




Description: A safety measure is an abstraction of a set of related design element structures and behaviors that collectively realize one or more safety requirements. (ref: Bruce Douglass)
Stereotype:
Main Diagram:
Defined in: Package SafetyRiskControlPkg

Classes:
Name
Description
ProtectedCRC
A cyclic redundancy check over data attribute values to identify in vivo corruption.
ProtectedOnesComp
The data is stored twice - once in normal form and once in one's complement form.
DataValidation
Data is monitored to observe if they are in the correct range.
